title: Retrieve Omeluum
content:
as Potion of Speed. Send one of your tank teammates to rescue him, and draw the attention of Sahuagin. Omeluum has a special spell that can teleport himself and one extra back to the sub, so don't worry about the time.

How to unlock Retrieve Omeluum

Retrieve Omeluum Rewards

Omeluum gives the following items: Wizardsbane Oil Fungal Bamboozler Scroll of Dimension Door Scroll of Sunbeam Potion of Supreme Healing

Wizardsbane Oil Fungal Bamboozler Scroll of Dimension Door Scroll of Sunbeam Potion
